main event: A silvery disc-shaped object was reportedly seen hovering over the vicinity of Lihue, Kauai, Hawaii on January 15, 1951 by responsible witnesses, including the county chairman and a supervisor.
interesting points: The object was described as hovering and then rapidly moving away into a cloud formation.
This was the third reported sighting of flying discs over Kauai.
The observers agreed the object was controlled, but there was no indication of how it was powered.
The report was forwarded to the Director of Special Investigations at Headquarters, United States Air Force in Washington, D.C.
The report was classified and downgraded at 3-year intervals, then declassified after 12 years.
witnesses: County Chairman and Supervisor H. K. Rice, among others
